thought: I need to craft 16 green_stained_glass_pane. To do so, I need to place 9 green_stained_glass into the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 green_stained_glass from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
